name: UpdateActivityRequest
desc: A report of the client’s current playback state and recent user interaction, and an opportunity for your service to modify the client’s playback queue.

items.name: constraints
items.desc: Limitations on the type and quantity of content to provide in a Queue.

items.name: nowPlaying
items.desc: The content the client is playing.

items.name: previouslyPlaying
items.desc: The content the client plays before the current content.

items.name: report
items.desc: The most-recent control the user interacts with, or the natural transition that occurs most recently.

items.name: timestamp
items.desc: The date and time of the reported event.

items.name: userActivity
items.desc: A description of the playback queue the client is playing.

items.name: version
items.desc: The version of the SiriKitMediaAPI library the client uses.
